dialogues:
I beseach thou,
I seek not for trouble

I am but a lone pilgrim
on my way to Lyublianaah.

Ahh, a pilgrim.
Pleased to meet you,
Hope you guess my name.

But whats troubling you,
Is the nature of my game.

Ok cool it with the
dadrock references.

NOW I LAY YOU
DOWN TO SLEEP
PRAY THE LORD
MY SOUL TO KEEP!

We find you here, now.
Because you are the one
fate has smiled upon.

This demon has sewn
his bad vibes upon this
land for too long.

He must be strewn down
into the void,
Into the hottest flame of
human fire.

But we can only extend
 our hand, You yourself
must grab it.

Finish your pilgrimage to
Lyublianaah.
Learn the ways of
the Sacred Lute.

It is only through the
divine psalm that we
can defeat this perversion
of the human soul.

No wizarding trickery
can save you now.
